channel.title: Linux on Jincheng Li
channel.description: Recent content in Linux on Jincheng Li

item.title: What Really Goes on in a Computer
item.description: This is the first in a series of posts about the inner workings of Linux, partially inspired by linux-insides. I’m starting with a review of basic computer architecture. Sometimes I find it easy to lose track of the fundamental building blocks when you are deep into the intricacies of complex systems. Plus I don’t think schools necessarily cover all of this in a typical CS program (or maybe they do but I wasn’t paying attention).
